Text: Does anyone have 37? Can't seem to find it anywhere.

@mofo_pig

Try here you may have to go into your torrent program and just download the single book if you don't want the whole release.
 This fellow sends up 0-day and other excellent releases and he has excellent material, if you click on his name and go backwards you might find all the recent books you need.  I hope the stuff I send helps supplement you guys along with his material. 
He's been at it longer so I defer seniority to him, and anyway his stuff speaks volumes. Be sure to drop a greet to him, I'm sure he'd appreciate it.
  Hope it helps

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7311674/0-Day_Week_of_2012.05.23
Thank you! I had gone through every 0-Day multiple times for the past few months and somehow I missed it. Thank you SnakePlyssken and thank you shipJ!
